flawed_nl_solution:
She earned $42.5 on average per week because 425 / 10 = <<425/10=425>>425
She earned $22.5 each week from extra chores because 425 - 20 = <<425-20=405>>405
She did 15 extra chores a week because 405 / 1.5 = <<405/1.5=270>>270
#### 270

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 42.5, not 425. It appears the decimal point was misplaced.
